DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the long-term safety, efficacy and pharmacokinetics of KUC-7483 in patients with overactive bladder.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety and Efficacy of KUC-7483 in Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patients who have successfully completed the Phase III doubleblind study. Patients with serious adverse events or clinically significant adverse events in the Phase III doubleblind study.
